name: Rental Complaint
description: Notify your landlord of a problem affecting your rental with a professional letter.

Pages.title: Tell Us About Your Concerns
Pages.subtitle: Please provide details about your housing situation below
Pages.tipText: Be as specific as possible. Include dates, locations, and any relevant documentation if available. Please do not Include any personal information in your answers.

questions.name: mainProblem
questions.label: What problems are occurring with your house/apartment?
questions.placeholder: Examples: no running water, no heat or A/C, lock is broken, etc

questions.name: problemLocations
questions.label: Where is each problem described happening?
questions.placeholder: Example: The bathroom sink is broken...

questions.name: startOfProblem
questions.label: When did each problem start?
questions.placeholder: Provide the date or time that the problem started

Pages.title: Additional Details
Pages.subtitle: Help us understand more about your situation
Pages.tipText: Continue to be specific with dates, locations, and any relevant details. This information helps create a clear record of your concerns.

questions.name: problemAffect
questions.label: How are these problems affecting your living situation?
questions.placeholder: Example: I can't take a shower, I feel unsafe, the apartment is too cold for my kids, etc.

questions.name: whatTheyTried
questions.label: Have you informed your landlord about these problems and have they replied?
questions.placeholder: Please include details about communications and replies from your landlord...

questions.name: solutionToProblem
questions.label: What would you like your landlord to do to fix these problems?
questions.placeholder: Provide details about what your landlord can do to fix this problem...

questions.name: solutionDate
questions.label: When would you like to have a solution to these problems?
questions.placeholder: Example: I would like this fixed as soon as possible, etc.

Pages.title: Final Question
Pages.subtitle: One last thing before we generate your letter
Pages.tipText: This final question helps us add context and information to your letter!

questions.name: addtionalInformation
questions.label: Do you have any additional information
questions.placeholder: Example: Any other details you'd like to include...

systemPrompt: It will be the body of a letter sent to the user's landlord, voicing their complaints. Do not include any heading or footer such as "Dear X" and "Sincerely, Y" because it is the body of the letter only.
userPrompt: The tenant's main problems are: {{.mainProblem}}. The locations are: {{.problemLocations}}. The problem began: {{.startOfProblem}}. The problems are affecting the tenant because: {{.problemAffect}}. The tenant has had the following communications with their landlord: {{.whatTheyTried}}. The tenant wants the landlord to: {{.solutionToProblem}}. The tenant expects the problem to be solved by: {{.solutionDate}}. The tenant provided additional information: {{.additionalInformation}}
